parameters.name: id__lt
parameters.description: filter on id being less than value.

parameters.name: id__lte
parameters.description: filter on id being less than or equal to value.

parameters.name: id__gte
parameters.description: filter on id being greater than or equal to value.

parameters.name: id__gt
parameters.description: filter on id being greater than value.

parameters.name: id__in
parameters.description: filter on id being one of comma-separated values.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: filter on the latitude equaling the exact supplied float value.

parameters.name: latitude__lt
parameters.description: filter on the latitude being less than values (south to).

parameters.name: latitude__lte
parameters.description: filter on the latitude being less than or equal to value (south of).

parameters.name: latitude__gte
parameters.description: filter on the latitude being greater than or equal to value (north of).

parameters.name: latitude__gt
parameters.description: filter on the latitude being greater than value.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: filter on the longitude equaling the exact supplied float value.

parameters.name: longitude__lt
parameters.description: filter on the longitude being less than the value.

parameters.name: longitude__lte
parameters.description: filter on the longitude being less than or equal to value (to the west of).

parameters.name: longitude__gte
parameters.description: filter on the longitude being greater than or equal to value (to the east of).

parameters.name: longitude__gt
parameters.description: filter on the longitude being greater than to value (to the east of).

parameters.name: asn
parameters.description: filter on probes announced by the autonomous system with the name of value. This field is useful for filtering when you don't care about IP version.

parameters.name: asn_v4
parameters.description: filter on probes that are announced by the autonomous system with the name of value with an IPv4 address.

parameters.name: asn_v6
parameters.description: filter on probes that are announced by the autonomous system with the name of value with an IPv6 address.

parameters.name: prefix_v4
parameters.description: filter on IPv4 prefix supplied by value. Paramater value should be supplied in CIDR notation. Irrelevant octets can be omitted.

parameters.name: prefix_v6
parameters.description: filter on IPv6 prefix supplied by value. Irrelevant hextets can be omitted.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The connection status [0 - Never Connected, 1 - Connected, 2 - Disconnected, 3 - Abandoned]

parameters.name: is_anchor
parameters.description: return probes that are anchors.

parameters.name: is_public
parameters.description: return probes that are public.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: filter on tags inside a list of comma-separated values. The returned probes have all tags set.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: filter on probes being within supplied radius of supplied latitude and longitude. Parameter value should be supplied as radius=lat(deg),lon(deg):radius(km).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: filter on id.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort on id only. -id means in descending order.

operations.notes:
Resource containing lists of RIPE Atlas Probes.

It is possible to get basic information on probes that are not marked "public", but operational details will be obscured.
operations.summary: Resource containing lists of RIPE Atlas Probes

apis.description: Resource containing lists of RIPE Atlas Probes

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: filter the probes on the specified date, in format YYYY-MM-DD

operations.notes:
Resource that returns a number of rankings ordered by ASN, prefix and country

This resource returns a JSON object with asn4, asn6, prefix4, prefix6 and country objects that contain the number of probes in that category ordered by quantity.
operations.summary: Resource that returns a number of rankings ordered by ASN, prefix and country

apis.description: Resource that returns a number of rankings ordered by ASN, prefix and country

parameters.name: conflicts_with
parameters.description: Conflicts with

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status

parameters.name: date_created
parameters.description: Date created

parameters.name: date_modified
parameters.description: Date modified

operations.notes: Resource describing a list of tags used for tagging probes
operations.summary: Resource describing a list of tags used for tagging probes

apis.description: Resource describing a list of tags used for tagging probes

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: test for existence of slug

operations.notes: Resource describing a tag used for tagging probes
operations.summary: Resource describing a tag used for tagging probes

apis.description: Resource describing a tag used for tagging probes

asn4.description: An array containing array [ASN_ID,NUMBER OF PROBES USING IPv4]

asn6.description: An array containing array [ASN_ID, NUMBER OF PROBES USING IPv6]

prefix4.description: An array containing array [IPv4 PREFIX, NUMBER OF PROBES HAVING IPv4 PREFIX]

prefix6.description: An array containing array [IPv6 PREFIX, NUMBER OF PROBES HAVING IPv6 PREFIX]

country.description: An array containing array [COUNTRY CODE, NUMBER OF PROBES IN COUNTRY]

slug.description: tag as a slug, the tagname in lowercase and hyphenated (for use in URLs).

address_v4.description: The last IPv4 address that was known to be held by this probe, or null if there is no known address. Note: a probe that connects over IPv6 may fail to report its IPv4 address, meaning that this field can sometimes be null even though the probe may have working IPv4

address_v6.description: The last IPv6 address that was known to be held by this probe, or null if there is no known address.

country_code.description:
An ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code indicating the country that this probe is located in,
as derived from the user supplied longitude and latitude

country_name.description: Name of the country where this probe is located

description.description: User defined description of the probe

first_connected.description: When the probe connected for the first time (UTC Time and date in ISO-8601/ECMA 262 format)

geometry.description: The geojson representation of the location of this probe, as provided by the probe owner.

is_anchor.description: Whether or not this probe is a RIPE Atlas Anchor

is_public.description: If a probe is not public then certain details, including exact IP addresses, are not returned.

last_connected.description: When the probe connected for the last time (UTC Time and date in ISO-8601/ECMA 262 format)

status.description: A JSON object containing id: The connection status ID for this probe (integer [0-3]), name: The connection status (string [Never Connected, Connected, Disconnected, Abandoned]), since: The datetime of the last change in connection status

address_v4.description: The last IPv4 address that was known to be held by this probe, or null if there is no known address. Note: a probe that connects over IPv6 may fail to report its IPv4 address, meaning that this field can sometimes be null even though the probe may have working IPv4

address_v6.description: The last IPv6 address that was known to be held by this probe, or null if there is no known address.

country_code.description:
An ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code indicating the country that this probe is located in,
as derived from the user supplied longitude and latitude

country_name.description: Name of the country where this probe is located

description.description: User defined description of the probe

first_connected.description: When the probe connected for the first time (UTC Time and date in ISO-8601/ECMA 262 format)

geometry.description: The geojson representation of the location of this probe, as provided by the probe owner.

is_anchor.description: Whether or not this probe is a RIPE Atlas Anchor

is_public.description: If a probe is not public then certain details, including exact IP addresses, are not returned.

last_connected.description: When the probe connected for the last time (UTC Time and date in ISO-8601/ECMA 262 format)

status.description: A JSON object containing id: The connection status ID for this probe (integer [0-3]), name: The connection status (string [Never Connected, Connected, Disconnected, Abandoned]), since: The datetime of the last change in connection status

status_since.description: A datetime field that can hold a datetime both as a timestamp and as a JSON datetime

asn4.description: An array containing array [ASN_ID,NUMBER OF PROBES USING IPv4]

asn6.description: An array containing array [ASN_ID, NUMBER OF PROBES USING IPv6]

prefix4.description: An array containing array [IPv4 PREFIX, NUMBER OF PROBES HAVING IPv4 PREFIX]

prefix6.description: An array containing array [IPv6 PREFIX, NUMBER OF PROBES HAVING IPv6 PREFIX]

country.description: An array containing array [COUNTRY CODE, NUMBER OF PROBES IN COUNTRY]

slug.description: tag as a slug, the tagname in lowercase and hyphenated (for use in URLs).
